metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35478 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: MediaWiki before 1.35.1 allows XSS via BlockLogFormatter.php.MediaWiki:blanknamespace potentially can be output as raw HTML with SCRIPTtags via LogFormatter::makePageLink(). This affects MediaWiki 1.33.0 andlater.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
